property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description: JDBC connect string for a JDBC metastore. For example: 1. jdbc:postgresql://postgres:5432/metastore 2. jdbc:derby:${HIVE_HOME}/metastore;databaseName=metastore_db;create=true 3. jdbc:mysql://mysql:3306/hive?createDatabaseIfNotExist=true

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName
property.description: Driver class name for a JDBC metastore. For example: 1. org.postgresql.Driver 2. org.apache.derby.jdbc.EmbeddedDriver 3. com.mysql.jdbc.Driver

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: Username to use against metastore database

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: password to use against metastore database
